vote.title: Authorize a Reimbursement Agreement with Union Pacific Railroad Company for preliminary engineering services for the portion of the proposed expansion of the Dallas Floodway Extension Lamar Levee that impacts Union Pacific’s operations, including improvements to infrastructure - Not to exceed $225,000.00 - Financing: Trinity River Corridor Project Fund (1998 General Obligation Bond Funds)
